AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user who performs an appraisal.

Comment.description: The dealer or customer provides a comment for the appraisal, such as instructions or context.

FinalAppraisalValue.description: The final appraisal value that sums up the total item final value and the total adjustment value of an appraisal.

InitiatedById.description: The account, contact, or user who initiates an appraisal.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the appraisal is active (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The owner of the appraisal record.

PurposeType.description: Specifies the purpose of the appraisal, such as sales, trade-in, or valuation of an asset.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record of an object, such as lead, account, opportunity, or application form product that serves as the context for the appraisal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the appraisal.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer to an appraisal.

TotalItemFinalValue.description: The cumulative value based on all the final values of all items related to the appraisal.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the appraisal.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date until which the appraisal is valid.
